name: Authority
description: The attacker impersonates an executive, IT Support, or law enforcement to force compliance.

name: Urgency / Scarcity
description: Time pressure or limited availability creates fear of missing out ('Account Deletion in 24h', 'Last Chance').

name: Social Proof / Consensus
description: Appeals to the desire to conform ('Everyone else has signed this', 'Join your team').

name: Liking / Similarity
description: Establishes rapport through shared interests or positive messaging ('Happy Holidays from your friends at HR').

name: Reciprocity
description: Creates obligation through perceived favor ('We fixed your account, please confirm', 'Here is a refund').

name: Consistency / Commitment
description: References prior fake interactions to build trust ('As we discussed', referencing a fake prior thread).

name: Fear / Curiosity
description: Exploits emotional responses ('Legal Action Pending' or 'See who viewed your profile').
